title: Cannabis and Cognition
itunes:title: Cannabis and Cognition
description:
Does cannabis use cause cognitive deficits? This episode discusses cannabis use and its long-term effects on cognition in adults and younger people. 

Faculty: Diana Martinez, M.D.
Hosts: Jessica Diaz, M.D., Flavio Guzman, M.D.

  • Learn more about our memberships here
  • Earn 0.75 CMEs: Medicinal Cannabis and the Psychiatric Patient: Clinical Harm vs Novel Treatment
  • Cannabis and Cognition
